item.title: SLA, SLO, SLI
item.description: As a person who is interacting with data, it is crucial to understand how the data is delivered. In the engineering realm, engineers are using the terms Service Level Agreements (SLA), Service Level Objectives (SLO), and Service Level Indicators (SLI), to align on the mutual understanding of the system. In the data world, it is also crucial to read them whenever they are available.
